name: Jungle Hunter Animal - Wolf Shoot Wild
name_original: Jungle Hunter Animal - Wolf Shoot Wild
description:
Jungle Hunter Animal - Wolf Shoot Wild is fun when one is a professional hunter as an amateur will endanger his life in trying to kill furious beasts.
This game is a brand new real hunting and sniper shooting experience which you might not been able to get in your real life. Those who cannot risk their life hunting wild animals can enjoy real hunting experience by playing this game.
